snippet: With a strong offense and an extra playoff berth available this season, the Blue Jays could contend for their first postseason appearance of the wild-card era.
abstract: With a strong offense and an extra playoff berth available this season, the Blue Jays could contend for their first postseason appearance of the wild-card era.

headline.main: Hope for the Blue Jays This Season
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Hope for Blue Jays
